A4.text: Stanisław II August was King of Poland

A5.text: Stanisław II August was the last monarch of the Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth

A6.text: the partitioning powers, seeing the increasing unrest in the remaining Commonwealth, decided to solve the problem by erasing any independent Polish state from the map
